extension.summary: European radio stations streaming live on the internet
extension.description: Welcome to listenlive.eu, a web radio directory showcasing over 4000 radio stations from across Europe streaming live on the internet.
A listenlive.eu több mint 4000 élo rádióadást tartalmaz Európából, melyeket az interneten keresztül érhetsz el.

extension.summary: Watch current movie trailers from apple.com.
extension.disclaimer: Only the most recent 100 or so trailers are listed.
extension.description: Watch current movie trailers from http://trailers.apple.com/.[CR][CR]Check movie showtimes for theaters in your area.

extension.summary: View videos of the latest news from CNN.
extension.disclaimer: CNN slants their views liberally. (Obama media)
extension.description: View videos of the latest news from CNN.
KaraokePlay has thousands of karaoke videos from youtube indexed. This allows you to browse and play them from xbmc.

Stream videos from YouTube, Clipfish, Kino.de, Computerclub², ARD & ZDF Mediathek, 3sat, Schweizer Fernsehen etc. Also live channels from different regions (DE, EN, FR, NL, SE, SP, THA, VN) and categories (kids, sports, music) are supported.
Download and install add-ons from googlecode.xbmc-addons addon repository.[CR][CR]By using this Repository you will be able to take advantage of our cutting edge features.
extension.disclaimer: Nuka1195 did not make all the add-ons on this repository and is not responsible for their content

extension.description: Watch movie trailers from http://trailers.apple.com/. Check movie showtimes for theaters in your area.

extension.summary: Re-create a full movie theater experience.
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: Play trailers, slideshows, intro videos, outro videos: To re-create a movie theater experience in the comfort of your home.
Reproduce Avances, presentaciones, videos de intro, videos de outro: Para recrear una experiencia como si estuvieses en una sala de Cine en la comodidad de tu casa.

extension.disclaimer: Only accurate for the version of xbmc this addon was run in.
extension.description: Creates html python help docs for xbmc, xbmcgui, xbmcplugin and xbmcaddon modules.

extension.summary: Find and display song lyrics including LRC (simple format).
extension.disclaimer: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License *see license.txt
extension.description: Find and display song lyrics from the internet. Uses embedded lyrics if available. Abilty to play and tag LRC (simple format) lyrics. Can be set to autoscroll untagged lyrics.[CR][CR]Primary and fallback scrapers. Artist's song lists if no song match was found. Artist aliases if no artist match was found.[CR][CR]Can run as a stand alone script (gui mode) or in the background.[CR][CR]*See readme.txt for a full description (can be viewed from settings).

extension.summary: Current weather conditions and colorful forecasts.
extension.description: Originally by Nuka1195.[CR][CR]This is the advanced weather source.[CR][CR]It provides not only current weather conditions but also extended forecasts and information including forecast videos and weather alerts.[CR][CR]Default weather provider is Weather.com, and you can use alternative providers such as Accuweather.com or NOAA.
